zone.line: wild & incoherent reproaches.. At length I gathered
resolution to speak, in a pause as it were in
the tempest of his passion — Your repentance is
now superflous: I said, If you had listened to
the voice of conscience, & heeded the stings of
remorse before you had urged your diabolical
vengeance to this extremity; Frankenstein would
yet have lived.
And do you dream — said the Dæmon, do
you think that I was then dead to agony &
remorse. – He– he ex p continued, pointing to
the corpse, he suffered not more in consum
-mation of the deed; oh not the ten thousandth
portion of the anguish that was mine during
the lingering detail of its execution. A frigh-
-tful selfishness hurried me on, while my heart
was poisoned with remorse. Think ye that
the groans of Clerval were music to my ear.
My heart was fashioned to be susceptible of
love & sympathy, & when wrenched by misery
to vice & hatred it did not endure the
violence of the change without torture
